RFM69Serial.packet¶

Module Contents¶

class RFM69Serial.packet.RFM69Packet(addr=0)¶

RFM69 packet class to store received message in a defined data structure. Currently, each packet object contains information about sender address and received message from the sender. The class also provides a public method to convert data list to string if necessary.

__slots__ is used to reduce memory.

__slots__ = ['_sender_addr', '_message_data']¶
property sender(self)¶
property message(self)¶
message_to_string(self)¶

Convert message data list to string if string type message is required by callers.
